name: Cavish(Jam Version)
description:
Made for the Kalorian Game Jam 1, Cavish puts you in the shoes of a small white creature who has to journey through a series of levels in search of gems. This is an extremely short platformer, with standard wasd to move and spacebar to jump controls.

Note: this version is the jam version, which was made in three days and isn't up to my quality standards. i'm planning on making a full version in the future.
